00019 void usage(const char *s) {
00020         cerr << "usage:\n" << s
00021                         << "[-m <model image>] [-r]\n"
00022                         "       -m      specifies model image\n"
00023                         "       -r      do not load any data\n"
00024                         "       -t      train a new classifier\n"
00025                         "       -g      recompute geometric calibration\n"
00026                         "       -l      rebuild irradiance map from scratch\n";
00027         exit(1);
00028 }

00030 int main( int argc, char** argv )
00031 {
00032         bool redo_geom=false;
00033         bool redo_training=false;
00034         bool redo_lighting=false;
00035 
00036         char *modelFile = "model.bmp";
00037         // parse command line
00038         for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00039                 if (strcmp(argv[i], "-m") ==0) {
00040                         if (i==argc-1) usage(argv[0]);
00041                         modelFile = argv[i+1];
00042                         i++;
00043                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-r")==0) {
00044                         redo_geom=redo_training=redo_lighting=true;
00045                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-g")==0) {
00046                         redo_geom=redo_lighting=true;
00047                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-l")==0) {
00048                         redo_lighting=true;
00049                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-t")==0) {
00050                         redo_training=true;
00051                 } else if (argv[i][0]=='-') {
00052                         usage(argv[0]);
00053                 } 
00054         }
00055 
00056         MultiGrab multi;
00057 
00058         char *blah;
00059         blah="foo";
00060         if( multi.init(!redo_training, blah) ==0)
00061         {
00062                 cerr <<"Initialization error.\n";
00063                 return -1;
00064         }
00065 
00066         cout << "Starting geometric calibration.\n";
00067 
00068         if (!geometric_calibration(multi, !redo_geom)) {
00069                 cerr << "Geometric calibration failed.\n";
00070                 return 2;
00071         }
00072 
00073         cout << "Geometric calibration OK. Calibrating light...\n";
00074         
00075         // start collecting light measurements
00076         multi.allocLightCollector();
00077 
00078         photometric_calibration(multi, 150, !redo_lighting);
00079 }

00081 bool geometric_calibration(MultiGrab &multi, bool cache)
00082 {
00083 
00084         if (cache && multi.model.augm.LoadOptimalStructureFromFile("camera_c.txt", "camera_r_t.txt")) {
00085                 return true;
00086         }
00087 
00088         const char *win = "BazAR";
00089 
00090         cvNamedWindow(win, CV_WINDOW_AUTOSIZE);
00091 
00092         // construct a CamCalibration object and register all the cameras
00093         CamCalibration calib;
00094 
00095         for (int i=0; i<multi.cams.size(); ++i) {
00096                 calib.AddCamera(multi.cams[i]->width, multi.cams[i]->height);
00097         }
00098 
00099         IplImage *display=0;
00100         bool success=false;
00101         bool end=false;
00102 
00103         int dispCam=0;
00104         int nbHomography =0;
00105         while (!end)
00106         {
00107                 // acquire images
00108                 multi.grabFrames();
00109 
00110                 // detect the calibration object in every image
00111                 // (this loop could be paralelized)
00112                 int nbdet=0;
00113                 for (int i=0; i<multi.cams.size(); ++i) {
00114                         if (multi.cams[i]->detect()) nbdet++;
00115                 }
00116                 
00117                 if (nbdet>0) {
00118                         for (int i=0; i<multi.cams.size(); ++i) {
00119                                 if (multi.cams[i]->detector.object_is_detected) {
00120                                         add_detected_homography(i, multi.cams[i]->detector, calib);
00121                                 } else {
00122                                         calib.AddHomography(i);
00123                                 }
00124                         }
00125                         nbHomography++;
00126                 }
00127 
00128                 if (nbHomography >=200) {
00129                         if (calib.Calibrate(
00130                                                 120, // max hom
00131                                                 (multi.cams.size() > 1 ? 1:2),   // padding or random
00132                                                 3,
00133                                                 .5,   // padding ratio 1/2
00134                                                 0,
00135                                                 0,
00136                                                 0.0078125,      //alpha
00137                                                 0.9,            //beta
00138                                                 0.001953125,//gamma
00139                                                 12,       // iter
00140                                                 0.05, //eps
00141                                                 3   //postfilter eps
00142                                            )) 
00143                         {
00144                                 calib.PrintOptimizedResultsToFile1();
00145                                 success=true;
00146                                 break;
00147                         }
00148                 }
00149                 if (display==0) display = cvCreateImage(cvGetSize(multi.cams[dispCam]->frame), IPL_DEPTH_8U, 3);
00150                 show_result(multi.cams[dispCam]->detector, multi.cams[dispCam]->frame, display);
00151                 cvShowImage(win, display);
00152 
00153                 int k=cvWaitKey(10);
00154                 switch (k) {
00155                         case 'q':
00156                         case 27: end=true; break;
00157                         case 'n': if(dispCam < multi.cams.size()-1) {
00158                                           cvReleaseImage(&display);
00159                                           ++dispCam; 
00160                                   }
00161                                   cout << "Current cam: " << dispCam << endl;
00162                                   break;
00163                         case 'p': if(dispCam > 0) {
00164                                           cvReleaseImage(&display);
00165                                           --dispCam;
00166                                   }
00167                                   cout << "Current cam: " << dispCam << endl;
00168                                   break;
00169                         case -1: break;
00170                         default: cout << (char)k <<": What ?\n";
00171                 }
00172         }
00173 
00174         if (display) cvReleaseImage(&display);
00175         if (success && multi.model.augm.LoadOptimalStructureFromFile("camera_c.txt", "camera_r_t.txt")) {
00176                 return true;
00177         }
00178         return false;
00179 }

00181 bool photometric_calibration(MultiGrab &multi, int nbImages, bool cache)
00182 {
00183         CalibModel &model(multi.model);
00184 
00185         if (cache) model.map.load();
00186 
00187         const char *win = "BazAR";
00188 
00189         cvNamedWindow(win, CV_WINDOW_AUTOSIZE);
00190 
00191         IplImage *display=0;
00192         bool success=false;
00193         bool end=false;
00194 
00195         int dispCam=0;
00196         int nbLightMeasures =0;
00197         while (!end)
00198         {
00199                 // acquire images
00200                 multi.grabFrames();
00201 
00202                 // detect the calibration object in every image
00203                 // (this loop could be paralelized)
00204                 int nbdet=0;
00205                 for (int i=0; i<multi.cams.size(); ++i) {
00206                         if (multi.cams[i]->detect()) nbdet++;
00207                 }
00208                 
00209                 bool frameOK=false;
00210                 if (nbdet>0) {
00211                         model.augm.Clear();
00212                         for (int i=0; i<multi.cams.size(); ++i) {
00213                                 if (multi.cams[i]->detector.object_is_detected) {
00214                                         add_detected_homography(i, multi.cams[i]->detector, model.augm);
00215                                 } else {
00216                                         model.augm.AddHomography();
00217                                 }
00218                         }
00219                         frameOK = model.augm.Accomodate(4, 1e-4);
00220                 }
00221 
00222                 if (display==0) display = cvCreateImage(cvGetSize(multi.cams[dispCam]->frame), IPL_DEPTH_8U, 3);
00223 
00224                 if (frameOK) {
00225                         // fetch surface normal in world coordinates
00226                         CvMat *mat = model.augm.GetObjectToWorld();
00227                         float normal[3];
00228                         for (int j=0;j<3;j++) normal[j] = cvGet2D(mat, j, 2).val[0];
00229                         cvReleaseMat(&mat);
00230 
00231                         // collect lighting measures
00232                         for (int i=0; i<multi.cams.size();++i) {
00233                                 if (multi.cams[i]->detector.object_is_detected) {
00234                                         nbLightMeasures++;
00235                                         model.map.addNormal(normal, *multi.cams[i]->lc, i);
00236                                 }
00237                         }
00238                         if (!model.map.isReady() && nbLightMeasures > 40) {
00239                                 if (model.map.computeLightParams()) {
00240                                         model.map.save();
00241                                 }
00242                         }
00243 
00244                         augment_scene(dispCam, model, multi.cams[dispCam]->frame, display);
00245                 } else {
00246                         cvCopy( multi.cams[dispCam]->frame, display);
00247                 }
00248                 cvShowImage(win, display);
00249 
00250                 int k=cvWaitKey(10);
00251                 switch (k) {
00252                         case 'q':
00253                         case 27: end=true; break;
00254                         case 'n': if(dispCam < multi.cams.size()-1) {
00255                                           cvReleaseImage(&display);
00256                                           ++dispCam; 
00257                                   }
00258                                   cout << "Current cam: " << dispCam << endl;
00259                                   break;
00260                         case 'p': if(dispCam > 0) {
00261                                           cvReleaseImage(&display);
00262                                           --dispCam;
00263                                   }
00264                                   cout << "Current cam: " << dispCam << endl;
00265                                   break;
00266                         case -1: break;
00267                         default: cout << (char)k <<": What ?\n";
00268                 }
00269         }
00270 
00271         if (display) cvReleaseImage(&display);
00272         if (success && model.augm.LoadOptimalStructureFromFile("camera_c.txt", "camera_r_t.txt")) {
00273                 return true;
00274         }
00275         return false;
00276 
00277 
00278         return false;
00279 }
00280 
00281 void show_result(planar_object_recognizer &detector, IplImage *video, IplImage *dst)
00282 {
00283         cvCopy(video, dst);
00284 
00285         if (detector.object_is_detected) {
00286                 for (int i=0; i<detector.match_number; ++i) {
00287 
00288                         image_object_point_match * match = detector.matches+i;
00289                         if (match->inlier) {
00290                                 cvCircle(dst,
00291                                         cvPoint((int) (PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->u, 
00292                                                                 int(match->image_point->scale), 0)),
00293                                                 (int)(PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->v, 
00294                                                                 int(match->image_point->scale), 0))),
00295                                         3, CV_RGB(0,255,0), -1, 8,0);
00296                         }
00297                 }
00298         }
00299 }
00300 
00301 static void augment_scene(int cam, CalibModel &model, IplImage *frame, IplImage *display)
00302 {
00303         cvCopy(frame, display);
00304 
00305         CvMat *m = model.augm.GetProjectionMatrix(cam);
00306         if (!m) return;
00307 
00308         double pts[4][4];
00309         double proj[4][4];
00310         CvMat ptsMat, projMat;
00311         cvInitMatHeader(&ptsMat, 4, 4, CV_64FC1, pts);
00312         cvInitMatHeader(&projMat, 3, 4, CV_64FC1, proj);
00313         for (int i=0; i<4; i++) {
00314                 pts[0][i] = model.corners[i].x;
00315                 pts[1][i] = model.corners[i].y;
00316                 pts[2][i] = 0;
00317                 pts[3][i] = 1;
00318         }
00319         cvMatMul(m, &ptsMat, &projMat);
00320         cvReleaseMat(&m);
00321 
00322         CvPoint projPts[4];
00323         for (int i=0;i<4; i++) {
00324                 projPts[i].x = cvRound(proj[0][i]/proj[2][i]);
00325                 projPts[i].y = cvRound(proj[1][i]/proj[2][i]);
00326         }
00327 
00328         CvScalar color = cvScalar(128,128,128,128);
00329 
00330         if (model.map.isReady()) {
00331                 CvMat *o2w = model.augm.GetObjectToWorld();
00332                 float normal[3];
00333                 for (int j=0;j<3;j++)
00334                         normal[j] = cvGet2D(o2w, j, 2).val[0];
00335                 cvReleaseMat(&o2w);
00336 
00337                 // we want to relight a color present on the model image
00338                 // with an irradiance coming from the irradiance map
00339                 color = cvGet2D(model.image, model.image->height/2, model.image->width/2);
00340                 CvScalar irradiance = model.map.readMap(normal);
00341 
00342                 // the camera has some gain and bias
00343                 const float *g = model.map.getGain(cam);
00344                 const float *b = model.map.getBias(cam);
00345 
00346                 // relight the 3 RGB channels. The bias value expects 0 black 1 white,
00347                 // but the image are stored with a white value of 255: Conversion is required.
00348                 for (int i=0; i<3; i++) {
00349                         color.val[i] = 255.0*(g[i]*(color.val[i]/255.0)*irradiance.val[i] + b[i]);
00350                 }
00351         } 
00352 
00353         // draw a filled polygon with the relighted color
00354         cvFillConvexPoly(display, projPts, 4, color);
00355 }
